summary: The bill, titled the Protect Our Treatment for Enamel, Erosion, and Tooth Health Act (Protect Our TEETH Act), aims to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act. It mandates the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to collaborate with the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine. Before setting fluoride regulations, the EPA must commission a rapid response evidence review by the Academies, considering the results and publishing the review in the Federal Register.
